kpi.name: cds_616a

kpi_info.title: Control unit handled traffic in CDS
kpi_info.use:
The amount of traffic handled by the control unit in erlangs.

This KPI is similar to msc_616a. New KPI ID reference (CDS NE). This new KPI ID reference is to to be used starting from M15.1 report sets.
kpi_info.use_experience:
For Time level aggregation, use AVG as a rule. For object level aggregation, use SUM.

PUBLISHED: M12
THEORETICAL SUMMARY LEVELS: CDS; UNIT
RECOMMENDED SUMMARY LEVELS: CDS
KPI CLASS: Traffic
MEASUREMENT(S): Control unit measurement report in CDS (M18)

kpi.kpi_alias: Control unit handled traffic in CDS
